data: Today_comma_as i was leaving for work in the morning_comma_i had a tire burst in the middle of a busy road. That scared the hell out of me!. Are you fine now?. Yeah_comma_i am doing alright now_comma_ but with minor injuries. Cool :) Is your car damaged a lot?. The car was badly damaged_comma_i veered outside the road and hit a tree trunk. next thing is insurance follow up.

A few weeks ago_comma_ I was walking through my hallway_comma_ minding my own business_comma_ when all of a sudden a hand reached out from under a table and grabbed my ankle. I was so suprised. I thought i was got. Turns out_comma_ it was my son. . That is funny_comma_ hope he didn not give you a heart attack. I may have let out a scream that will have him question my manhood for the rest of our lives_comma_ lol. . I would probably scream also.

I am overly excited because will be flying outside the country for the first time tomorrow.".  Please enter here... Wow! That sounds amazing. Where are you going? . Traveling to South Africa then to Ghana. Also my first time visiting Africa. You are going to love it I am sure. Safe Travels! .

One time_comma_ I was holding my son over my head_comma_ when all of a sudden_comma_ he threw up all over my face. I almost cried. Thats horrible_comma_ hope he is ok. yeah_comma_ he had just drank a bottle_comma_ and I was moving him around like an airplane. In retrospect. I deserved it. I see_comma_ glad he is ok.

Hello. Hi_comma_ how are you?. Im doing great i just wanted to tell you a short story about a time i helped an elderly lady.  She was struggling to carry her bags from a trip she had took.  I helped her carry them to her door ! Pretty good feeling when you help others . That was kind of you_comma_ I am sure they appreciated that!.

I went to the Kemah boardwalk with my boyfriend. It made me think of times I went vacationing with my family. My last vacation went horribly wrongQ!. All I thought about was being at home again and being able to relive those moments. Yes I love to reminice.

My dog died a few years ago after I had my son.  It was right around Christmas and I had the dog for fourteen years. Im sorry to hear that. I have never had a dog. What was your experience of the dog?. The dog was there with my throughout my life. He saw me through boyfriends and friends. I am really sorry to hear that. What was the dogs name?.

hello. Hello How are you and what is your story chat about today? . I locked my keys in my car about a week ago. It was 95 degrees outside and I was at the store getting groceries. OMG wow.... i hope you got it open quick! . luckily there are police who patrol around the mall on the other end of the parking lot. one of them got it open for me.

Hello. Hi_comma_ a few months ago_comma_ my mother found some stray dogs that were starving_comma_ so she told us about them. Of course_comma_ we brought the poor babies to our house_comma_ a mother dog and her two puppies. My heart went out to them_comma_ as their ribs were showing_comma_ but they were still so loving and sweet. Oh no im so sorry to hear that :/ Thats good that you took them in . Yes_comma_ I really felt so much sympathy for them and we all really liked them. We already had several pets_comma_ so I wasn not going to keep them_comma_ but I wanted to help them get better and find them a good home. We did for all of them_comma_ with the puppies being able to stay together.

I wanted to let you know recently i saw a younger man helping an old lady who fell to the ground. Its nice to see people helping others. That is really nice to see... I bet it made you feel good! So sweet. . yeah it made me feel great :). Nice to still see that behavior in todays world. :).

So this one time my grandmother gave me a scooter_comma_ it was the best gift ever_comma_ I was really happy. Thats sweet that you remember that_comma_ how old were you? . I was around 10 years old I think_comma_ it was quite a long time ago for me now haha!. I wont make you reveal your age! lol :p . Hah appreciated_comma_ have you ever received a fun gift?.

I was extremely lucky when my girlfriend said she would date me_comma_ she is my world now. That is wonderful. How long have you guys been dating?. We have been together for close to 5 months now_comma_ so not very long haha!. Time flies by pretty fast. Could be together 10 years from now!. I hope so haha_comma_ are you dating anyone?.
I started a new job about a month ago and it is going really well. congratualtions. what do you do?. I work in I.T. for the provincial government in Canada :). oh wow. we are practically neighbors.

So my friend built a deck and it turned out amazing_comma_ I didn not know he had it in him. How big was the deck?. I think its probably about 20 feet by 25 feet? I am bad at guessing that kind of stuff hah. Wow that is big.

My girlfriends really quiet and she tends to scare me a lot. What is scary about what she is doing? I am not quite understanding what you mean. Well_comma_ when shes dealing with her own personal issues she tends to kind of just vanish_comma_ I haven not talked to her in a few days and it is making me worry. Oh wow_comma_ I can see why you are worrying. You should really talk to her about all this if she comes around soon.

I have to fill out forms all day so I scripted a program that does half of it for me and it works really well!. Thats great. Did you create the script?. Yeah_comma_ had to google a bit of it but it worked out well. I love google. It is my favorite search engine.

I was extremely relieved when I found out my dad beat cancer. Thats wonderful news! Its such a nasty disease! How long has he been clear? . About 2 years now. Well I hope he has 100 more years to go! :) .

My girlfriend hasn not talked to me in a few days and I am struggling to keep it together but I am at the moment. Have you tried to call her?. I have_comma_ but she is going through a rough time and likes to seclude herself. Maybe give her space.
My grandma gave me a stone and said it was my birthstone and I hold it very close to my heart now. What birthstone is it. It is amethyst. What birthstone is it?.
I play some competitive video games and I think I am pretty good at one of them. I love to play Madden. Do you play Madden often?. Yes_comma_ every day.

I haven not been able to talk to my girlfriend in a few days and it is making me quite sad. Where is she?. She is in the same city as me_comma_ but she is going through a hard time and has decided to seclude herself so I can not reach her. Just give her space.
My daughter is very smart. She learns things really quickly. Thats great. Yes_comma_ she picks up on things that I didn not even think she knew about. Did you teach her?.

I can not believe how big the waves are. Hurricane Chris amped up my summer. Did you stay and ride it out? I bet it was quite a thing to see!. Yes_comma_ I have been surfing for ever. Only three of us in the water. . That must be so much fun. I have never surfed but love to be on a boat. . You are never to old to start. I am teaching my mate and he is 70 I think. Hopefully I have a boat soon. . Wow I hope I am fit enough at 70 to surf!.

I usually hate to ask for help_comma_ so when my friends all surprised me by taking turns bringing us meals for 2 weeks after my #order child was born I was blown away. I was so relieved to have help. . Wow_comma_ 4 children my first is on the way and I am freaking out. You must have great friends.  . That is so exciting_comma_ congratulations! We moved 17 hours away from family_comma_ so having a great group of friends is really important to us. . Thank You. That is our next step we are moving from NYC to Miami after the baby. How can we find friends like yours? . Get involved in something. Church_comma_ a social club for interests you are in. I don not recommend parent groups_comma_ for some reason they get really nasty. Just find a way to connect with people. Having children is so much harder without a support system!. I see what you mean about a parents group. I joined a dads group in facebook and it is full of people who complain non stop about  being an adult. .

I went to this thing called a Paint Night and I ended up making an okay looking painting. That sounds fun_comma_ I was never any good at painting. I am not either_comma_ but they had an instructor to follow along to! :). That probably helps a good deal!.

That Jerk_comma_ Did nt even wave when he cut me off. . I wish I had a rubber bumper to ram those people with!. After the Apocalypse I will just ran them off the road. To make things worse he was in a Horse and Buggy. . That is terrible_comma_ he could have hurt the horse!. That is what me the most mad. It is like he did not care at all. .

So I got a new job recently_comma_ and I got my first paycheck and it was pretty good compared to what I was expecting!. Nice_comma_ congratulations. How are you liking the new job itself?. It is pretty good so far_comma_ I think I am gonna like it for the long haul!. Awesome_comma_ I hope the job goes great for you!.

When I was a little girl_comma_ our cat ran away and was gone so long we didn not think he would come home so we adopted another kitten. . Thats sad_comma_ hopefully the new cat got to live a long and full life with you. Well_comma_ we had a funny twist. The same day we brought the new kitten home_comma_ or old cat showed up. We kind of thought maybe he was hanging out close to home and was mad that we replaced him. Haha thats crazy_comma_ I hope they became best friends_comma_ I love cats.

I really liked having my mom here. She helped with the kids but then when she left I missed it. I can imagine! That extra set of hands -- and a person you can *trust* -- that is the best!. Yes_comma_ the kids really missed her when she left. It took us a while to get back to the normal around here. Does she live far away? It sounds like maybe visits aren not too frequent.

This one time I spent an entire hour waiting for food at dennys. An hour? Damn for somewhere as meh as Denny that really isn not worth it. Its really not_comma_ the foods not worth that long of a wait. I haven not been there in so long for that exact reason.

I went to a nice work dinner with my husband. I can not get over how stupid I made myself look. . Oh really? What happened that made you look bad?. I went to the bathroom real fast before we went into the dining room. I tucked my dress into my panty hose and didn not even notice. I walked past everyone with my underwear showing. I am sure I will laugh about it... someday. . Oof yea that seems like it might take a few years or 10 before you can laugh at it but at least its over.

A lady was having issues with a program on her computer_comma_ and I solved it with no problems!. That is awesome! My experience was quite opposite as I sat waiting in the dentist chair for a 2 1/2 hour procedure!. That sounds unpleasant_comma_ did you get in afterwards?. Yes! I am actually glad it is over :) So_comma_ how long did it take you to fix the computer problem?.

I am so angry they end up charging me 255 in charges that did not belong to me.  . Yeah_comma_ that is pretty annoying to have happen. I called them and did not hold back. . Good man! That is your money and they just wanna snatch from you. I was going to go down and go nuts but my wife stopped me. .

My friend was telling me about teaching jobs to apply for. I didn not get hired_comma_ but she got one right off the bat!. It sounds like you are happy for her_comma_ which is commendable given you didn not get hired. Were you very disappointed?. I was kind of envious that she got the job and I didn not because it seemed like I was more qualified than she was. That is always tough. It is so hard to tell what other factors come into play in situations like that. Are you happy where you are currently at_comma_ or still looking?.

My girlfriend has some mental health issues and sometimes ends up in the hospital_comma_ and I go and see her as often as I can. I am so sorry about that. It sounds like you are doing your best to be supportive. Thanks_comma_ I am definitely trying to be as supportive as I can_comma_ she is my world. She is very lucky to have you. I wish you guys the best!.

I love going to places that I explored and play at as a child. Every time I go_comma_ I always feel super nostalgic. I am very nostalgic too_comma_ that must be a fun time!. Yes_comma_ until you realize that it was 20 years since you played there_comma_ and you start feeling old. That is true_comma_ but it is part of life_comma_ but it is cool to see things again_comma_ regain perspective.

I hope this doesn not make me sound like a horrible boyfriend_comma_ but when my girlfriend first moved into my house_comma_ I felt very apprehensive towards the move at first. I was used to it being one way_comma_ and she was changing everything. Took some getting used to. I am sure it did! It is not easy to have to adapt to another person habits. I know. It caused some tension the first week or so. I had to take a deep breath_comma_ and realize its just things_comma_ and it was just me being reluctant to change. . Yes_comma_ sometimes we have to learn to let go of the little things so we can appreciate the more important things. It sounds like you have done a great job!.

I always hate thinking that my son is getting old. Just like a few days ago_comma_ I was looking at some of my sons old clothes_comma_ and it made me very sentimental. I never want him to get old on me. . I believe you are really sad although it is a fact of life. Yes. You get to see them change and grow. It makes it all worth it. . True_comma_ and the good thing is that when the kids grow_comma_ they provide moral support to parents.

I love a good surprise like anyone else; however_comma_ when my girlfriend waited until 8 pm on my birthday to tell me happy birthday and give me a present_comma_ I was caught off guard. I thought she had forgot. . Maybe she did and remembered last minute. You should ask her!. She remembered but was trying to draw it out to make me think that she had forgot. I should have known because I made her wait until 10 pm on her birthday. Next year I would just forget her birthday all together!.

I work two full time jobs and he stays at home all day_comma_ Not Fair!. Is he a stay at home father_comma_ or does he just not want to work?. He is 20 he just wants to party and sleep. I am sorry to hear that. Maybe as he gets older he will get his priorities in order and see how hard you work. Doubtful_comma_ he is a punk!.

So the other day was my #order Birthday! I had no idea what my friends had planned but i walked into a room_comma_ a room which i thought was empty as the lights were all off_comma_ and all my friends jumped out and yelled happy birthday! It was such a shock_comma_ and felt so nice to have people who cared deeply about me provide me with such an experience! . Must of been pretty surprised_comma_ Also great to have friends like that. It really was! They even had my favorite kind of cake_comma_ chocolate mousse from my favorite bakery! . That must of just made everything even better!. Right?! I mean who doesn not love cake. But that is not even the best part. on the counter_comma_ there was a HUGE pile of presents calling my name. .

I am thrilled. I got a raise!. That is a great news. You surely have done a great job. Best Ever. I didn not have a clue I was going to get it. I just walked in and boom got a raise. You are very lucky. Your not kidding and to think I was going to quit. .

Have you seen the film "within" on netflix? The other night my boyfriend and i watched it and I had trouble sleeping afterwards_comma_ it was pretty creepy!. No I haven not actually_comma_ I recently just canceled my netflix service! I have been thinking about resubscribing though. . Why did you cancel your subscription? If you ever re-subscribe i would definetly recommend checking out "within"!. I could not find the content that was best suited for me personally to consider it worthy at the time_comma_ but if I do I will definitely check it out!.

I spilt wed wine on my moms red carpet and blamed it on the cat. Was the color of red that different to show on the red carpet?. Very! It was a dark maroon stain. . Oh! wow that must of been pretty obvious then.

My wife is angry and I don not know what to say. My anniversary was yesterday and I had no clue!. Argh! That is tough! Have you been able to come from a place of authentic apology? It can be easy to be defensive in those situations_comma_ which of course only makes it worse!. I am still working on it. she has has not given me much of a chance. . What your approach? Does humor ever work....? You know_comma_ like wearing a dunce cap while holding a huge bouquet of flowers? Or going John Cusack and holding a boombox overhead_comma_ playing "your" song?. I used diamond earrings. .

So the other night my boyfriend and I were out socializing at a networking event and another woman went up to him and touched his arm I coudn not help but feel a little envious even though he pulled away. You should not be so insecure like that. Its not about insecurity! . What is about them? Do you think he is better than you?.

Have you ever been to Las Vegas? . yes_comma_ several times.The place is magical. I am actually going for the first time in my adult life this fall! I am really excited!. Well_comma_ you are about to have the fun of your life_comma_ but gamble responsible.

I was thinking about my boyfriends wedding proposal the other night_comma_ it had left me in absolute shock. I did not expect him to get down on one knee and propose. Why. Did you started dating recently or something. No we would been dating a very long time but he was never the traditional kind. Never wanted an official ceremony but after meeting me i guess it all changed!. The most important thing is what you want.

I am one of the best surfers that has ever hit the beach. I ride giants. Really?? are you famous then? What is your name?. Yes_comma_ you can google me. Are you still competing on a professional level?. Nope_comma_ I have got a family now to support so I surf less and work more. But I have still got killer moves. .

I can not believe the bottom of the bag ripped and my wonderful taco covered the ground. I am sure my face was bright red with anger. NOT THE TACOS!!!! Seriously_comma_ I can understand how frustrating that is. Especially when you have the taste for something.....then gone!. It is not like I could back in. I waited in line 20 minutes and had been looking forward to them all day. I had to skip lunch due to work being busy. I am still mad. Even worse. I am so sorry. What did you do instead?. A bowl of dry cereal. . Laughing *and* crying for you! Next time!. Text time I am going to treat those sweet fatty taco like the baby of Jesus. I get heated up just thinking of it. I wish I could emoticon this whole thing.....a string of cry-laughing. I wish I could treat you to lunch there!.

Have you ever participated in any races_comma_ half or full marathons? . I have not! I used to run a lot for soccer practices. Have you?. I have not either! My best friend recently recovered from a broken leg and just completed her first full marathon_comma_ it was inspirational!. That is great for her. .

I am not afraid to admit this: I am 32 and afraid of the dark. The other day_comma_ my electricity went out due to a storm. It was dark_comma_ I couldn not find my phone or a light_comma_ so I screamed for my girlfriend to wake up. Am I embarrassed to say that_comma_ not at all_comma_ lol. hahaha thats funny why are you still afraid of the dark?. I am not scared of the dark. I am just scared of the things in the dark. And the ironic thing is_comma_ I don not even believe in the supernatural_comma_ so I am scared of the dark to just be scared of it_comma_ I think. . OOO so you think something else is hiding in the dark and that is why your scared?. Nope. I am just scared that in case there is the supernatural. It makes sense in my head;however_comma_ when I am saying it out loud_comma_ it doesnt_comma_ lol.

Before I applied at Inline I really did some background research on the company and what all they were involved in. That is probably the best thing to do before you go to work for a place. Were you happy with your results?. I was!  It ended up securing me the job because the company itself is small so the CEO and interviewer were really impressed.. Sometimes it is the extra step someone is willing to do that will make it. Good for you!. Thank you!  I really enjoy this position a lot so I am happy it turned out well.

My husband hangs steel and the last time he had to go work in another state I felt really lost and alone for a bit. I feel the same way when I am away from my cat.  Does he have to travel a lot for work?. Sometimes he does.  Lately there hasn not been any local work so he has had to go out of state and its just too far to come back. Maybe one day if you have the time_comma_ you can pay him a surprise visit. That is a good idea! I will have to sneak his work schedule and give it a try.
I made it on time to the bus stop. That is good. Where you running late. I was running late and so did the bus. That sucks. I hate when I am running late I always feel behind.

So I kind of ate the last piece of pizza that we had and I didn not know Tom wanted it... Feeling kinda bad. I don not think you should feel bad_comma_ you didn not know!. Yeah but he just seemed so disappointed when he came home for lunch. I am sure he will be okay. Maybe you can make it up to him. I should probably just buy him another pizza soon. Sounds like a good idea.

I will start off saying I hate the water! I can not stand being in it; however_comma_ that changed last week when I took my son to his first pool. His joy erased all my hatred for water. . Aw. Children will make us do things we NEVER thought we would (or could) do! . Yes! I start swimming lessons next week. I have went 32 years without knowing how to swim_comma_ and that one visit changed all that. . That is SO exciting! Congratulations! You are a fabulous role model for your son.

Oh today I heard one of Nannie favorite songs on the radio.  It made me really miss our car rides together.  . Oh that is so sweet. My grandmother is a great person too and I am glad to know her. She was a lovely lady indeed!  I miss our time together a lot especially when I hear the music she used to listen to. I think it is great that you have such positive memories of her_comma_ that way she will always be there in some form.

Do you go visit some place that makes you miss growing up?. Yes_comma_ I love to visit the zoo!  . I recently went back to Michigan and got visit my old town and even the High school I had such great times back then. What were some of your favorite things to do back in highschool?. I played Football all 4 years_comma_ used to Skateboard in the parking lot and hang out in the auto shop. The good old days.

My mother was always there for me when I was sick_comma_ annoyed and sad. That is wonderful!. It is always nice to have at least one good parent. Well my dad too but my mum was so much more_comma_ even when I was naughty she was still there. My mom was pretty awesome too! I am glad you had a good one as well.

When I was little I got chased by a large dog and now that I am much older the feeling is still the same. . That is bad. Are you still afraid a lot?. I am_comma_ everytime I see a dog_comma_ I begin to run the other direction instantly. You need to fight your fear.

I actually have no friends_comma_ can you believe that? I am ok with it though. wow that is very sad!  I am really sorry!. No_comma_ it is not sad. I really like to be alone_comma_ as i am an introvert. I need my space. Well I guess if that is something you enjoy.  I can not say that I have alot of friends.  Mostly my friends are family . Well in that case_comma_ I have a few friends. Outside of family_comma_ I don not. .

Do you ever find it hard to see at night when it is raining?. Yes I do actually_comma_ I was almost in an accident because of rain at night once. . That is so scary! I am always on edge in those cases. I hydroplaned really bad last time. I am glad you were okay and nothing bad happened. . Thank you. I have never been in a traffic accident. Thank goodness for that.

I was eating at a restaurant and as I was leaving_comma_ an employee there gave me my phone which I had left behind. Oh that was so nice of them! I bet you were relieved!. I was_comma_ it saved me a lot of problems. I bet_comma_ losing your phone causes all kinds of stress!.

I written down my notes on a double sided A4 paper_comma_ now I just have to wait for the exam which will begin in the next 5 minutes. Okay that is good to know. Hopefully you pass the test and I hope you studied. . Oh I did_comma_ I have been doing it for weeks!. Very nice man. Let me know your exam results when they are released! .

When that happened to me_comma_ even the teacher couldn not stop herself from laughing. . That is hilarious. I bet. I was so awkward and quiet in school_comma_ how about yourself?. Oh my just the opposite LOL. So you were outgoing and popular_comma_ huh?.

Thanks I am stressed_comma_ excited and hopeful for the future. Do you have kids?. I do not yet but hope to one day. I think you will be a great parent! . Thank you. We have been trying for a year. .

I was just speaking with my buddy. He is very over wight and somehow finished a marathon last weekend. Impressive!. wow yes it is . I couldn not believe it. Just the day before we were crushing cheese steaks. He probably stored that up for his energy for the race. I guess_comma_ I;m sure he eat again after that. He loves food. My friend stayed awake for 36 hours studying for the MCAT! . Haha oh wow_comma_ how was that for them. she did well actually_comma_ i was impressed with how well she managed to do despite lack of sleep!. Thats great_comma_ im glad she did well.

I was busy due to work and visited my family for the first time in awhile. That sounds nice! DId you have fun. It was great_comma_ felt refreshing to be around them. I am glad you enjoyed yourself_comma_ it is important to make time for family.

I get so annoyed with people who say one thing and do something else. My boss is one of those people. I have an 8 hour shift in the office today but i can not wait to go home to see my boyfriend! . you will survive_comma_ and you have something to look forward to. exactly_comma_ it is keeping me going since i am not feeling to good today!. i hope your work day goes by fast.

When I was 12_comma_ I got ran over by a truck. I was with my older cousin and his car messed up. Since he was my hero_comma_ I listened to everything he said_comma_ so when he told me to get the truck rolling and jump in. I listened. however_comma_ my 12 year old legs didn not make it and got trapped under the truck. Oh wow that is so scary.  I can not believe he asked someone so young to do that. Are you doing anything different this time?.

So as I have gotten older over the last 10 years. I gained 30 pounds. My wife has me on a diet but every night when she goes to bed I have a bowl of ice cream. . Don not even tlak about diets.I miss the times i was young and could eat all i wanted. yea but those times are behind us. Tonight for dinner was a Kale salad. It was gross but I have gotten a dish or rocky road with my name on it later. I do feel bad for lying to her but I need it. Ugh.So boring.What wrong with being fat.At least they are all happy. I think I am average. I am 5 11" 190. It could be worse. I still exercise a lot. Perhaps I need to enjoy the ice cream more and try to feel less guilty.  .

Have you ever felt sandpaper on your bottom? Because that is what the new recycled toilet paper my wife want us to use feels like. . Holy smokes! Let me guess_comma_ better for the environment?. yes but in the end it is still paper and still going to the same place. I dream of the day I can enjoy Angel Soft or Charmin again. You poor soul!
